bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love sweet things and make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🐝 I live in a hive.
🍯 I make something delicious.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl around your house. Some people think I'm creepy!

hints.text: 🏠 I like dark places.
🕸️ I spin a web.
🕷️ I catch other bugs.

bug.question: I am a colorful bug that starts as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat leaves when I am young.
🦋 I have beautiful wings.
🌈 I can fly from flower to flower.

bug.question: I make a chirping sound at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am mostly active at night.
🦗 I have long legs for jumping.
🎶 I make a sound by rubbing my wings together.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but strong.
🏠 I live in a colony.
👑 We work together to find food.

bug.question: I'm a beetle that looks like a gem, often red with black spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People think I bring good luck.
⚫ I am often red with black dots.
🪲 I eat aphids that harm plants.

bug.question: I fly at night and light up! What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow in the dark.
✨ I am a type of beetle.
🌙 You can see me on summer nights.

bug.question: I suck blood and can be annoying when you're outside near water. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I leave itchy bites.
💧 I am attracted to water.
🔊 I make a buzzing sound.

bug.question: I have a long body, many legs, and curl up when I'm scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to hide under rocks and logs.
💯 I have many legs, but not a hundred!
🌀 I roll into a ball for protection.

bug.question: I'm a flying insect with a long, slender body and two pairs of delicate wings. I am often found near ponds and streams. What am I?

hints.text: 🎣 I catch other insects while flying.
🏞️ I lay my eggs in or near water.
💎 My wings are often transparent with beautiful patterns.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am a very large animal.
💧 I use my long nose to drink.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with string.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈‍⬛ I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🌾 I eat seeds and insects.

animal.question: I am a big cat with a mane. I am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I roar loudly.
🍖 I am a predator.
👑 I have a lot of courage.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. I live in Australia. What am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I have strong legs for jumping.
🌿 I eat plants.
🇦🇺 I am a symbol of my country.

animal.question: I am a black and white striped animal. People often ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I have a unique pattern on my body.
🐎 I look like a horse.
🌿 I eat grass.

animal.question: I am a reptile that can change colors to blend in with my surroundings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦎 I have a long, sticky tongue.
👁️ My eyes can move independently.
🦗 I eat insects.

animal.question: I build dams and have large front teeth. I am a very busy builder. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I use wood to build my home.
🌊 I live in and around water.
🦫 I am a rodent.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal bird known for my wisdom. I hoot and have large eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I can turn my head almost all the way around.
🌙 I hunt at night.
🐭 I often eat rodents.

animal.question: I am a large sea mammal with a blowhole on my back. I sing songs under the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am one of the largest animals on Earth.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
💨 I breathe air, even though I live in the water.
